docs.text: dvc-project-template DVC project template STEPS - STEP 01- Create a repository by using template repository STEP 02- Clone the new repository STEP 03- Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE conda create --prefix ./env python = 3 .7 -y conda activate ./env OR source activate ./env STEP 04- install the requirements pip install -r requirements.txt STEP 05- initialize the dvc project dvc init STEP 06- commit and push the changes to the remote repository
